title: Why did Rick Astley's Never Gonna Give You Up go viral? - Quora

response.answer_text: The song went viral because of a meme that was started on 4chan, it’s was a bait and switch where people would give a link that they would say was for something else, then to be tricked and taken to the song link for Rick Astley’s Never gonna give you up. This was commonly known as Rickrolling and started around 2006–2007.
